title: Wells fargo
blurb: I'm unfortunately unable to share any code from my work with Wells Fargo, but here are some screen shots of the products I contributed to.

title: SickFits
blurb: Sick is a storefront with full crud application, credit card charging, access permissions built on top of a Prisma/GraphQL data layer and deployed on Heroku.

title: Coach queue
blurb: Coach queue is a time tracker and student request tool built for Learner's Guild.

title: Walk Cycles
blurb: Having fun designing walk cycles. Characters designed in Illustrator and animated in Premiere.

title: Social Media UX
blurb: Having fun designing walk cycles. Characters designed in Illustrator and animated in Premiere.
